item.title: Installing VMware ESXi fails on Cisco UCS Blades with FlexFlash SD cards
item.description: When implementing a new Cisco UCS environment I encountered the following error when trying to install VMware ESXi 6.5 on a Cisco UCS Blade server with a FlexFlash SD card: Operation failed This program has encountered an error: partedUtil failed with message: “Error: Canâ€™t have a a partition outside the disk!
